alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 3:38PM EST until November 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Crawford County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow will shift inland overnight into Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
